featured.text: Sales of rap music and videos each exceed that amount.
In 1790, President George Washington declared that the federal government would reside in a district “not exceeding ten miles square … on the river Potomac.”

definition.zh_def: 超過，超出（某個範圍、數量或限制）
definition.en_def: To go beyond a limit or surpass something.
definition.example: The athlete managed to exceed his previous record in the competition.
